name: Sounds of Blackness
description: '''Sounds of Blackness''' is a [[vocal music|vocal]] and [[instrumental]] ensemble from [[Minneapolis/St. Paul, Minnesota]] who perform music from several genres music including gospel, R&B, soul, and jazz. The group scored several hits on the [[Billboard R&B chart|''Billboard'' R&B]] and [[Hot Dance Music/Club Play]] charts in the 1990s. [[Cynthia Johnson]] of [[Lipps Inc.]] and [[Ann Nesby]] are the group's most prominent alumni.
